connect20/sailthru_personalized_email_co.name: connect20/Sailthru_Personalized_Email_Communication

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/sailthru_personalized_email_co.description: The Sailthru extension enables you route all transactional emails through Sailthru as well as utilize the powerful suite of products from Sailthru that enable each Merchant to truly personalize email communication.
